Uses of Class
org.jgrapes.io.util.PermitsPool

Packages that use PermitsPool
Package Description
org.jgrapes.io.util
Utility classes, mainly for adapted buffers to specific needs.
org.jgrapes.net
Networking related I/O classes.

  • Uses of PermitsPool in org.jgrapes.io.util

    Methods in org.jgrapes.io.util that return PermitsPool
    Modifier and Type Method Description
    PermitsPool PermitsPool.acquire()
    Acquire a permit, waiting until one becomes available.
    PermitsPool PermitsPool.addListener​(AvailabilityListener listener)
    Adds an AvailabilityListener.
    PermitsPool PermitsPool.augmentPermits​(int permits)
    Adds the given number of permits to the pool.
    PermitsPool PermitsPool.reducePermits​(int permits)
    Remove the given number of permits from the pool.
    PermitsPool PermitsPool.release()
    Release a previously obtained permit.
    PermitsPool PermitsPool.removeListener​(AvailabilityListener listener)
    Removes the listener.
    Methods in org.jgrapes.io.util with parameters of type PermitsPool
    Modifier and Type Method Description
    void AvailabilityListener.availabilityChanged​(PermitsPool pool, boolean available)
    Called when the availability has changed.
